```{r}
# load libraries
library(bigchess)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
# read pgn file into chess_games
chess_games <- read.pgn(
  con = "lichess_KozQueen_2023-10-10.pgn"
)

# and turn it into a data.table
chess_games <- data.table(chess_games)
```
